text:
Strikingly (YC W13) | Shanghai, China | DevOps, Ruby, Mobile | Fulltime

Strikingly is powering the next generation of websites. Our mission is to give everyone the ability to turn their creative ideas into reality and build brands around them. We're a small team working internationally and based in Shanghai. Backed by Y Combinator (W13), SV Angel, Index Ventures, FundersClub, Innovation Works, and more.

More Information: http://www.strikingly.com/s/careers

Email us if you are intersted in the opportunity: jobs@strikingly.com
